places.name: Lothlorien
places.description: Lothlorien is an elven kingdom protected by Galadriel and Celeborn, known for its magic, beauty and tranquility.

places.name: Gondor
places.description: Gondor is a human kingdom in Middle Earth, known for its majestic capital Minas Tirith and its courage in the fight against Sauron.

places.name: Mordor
places.description: Mordor is a barren and desolate land in Middle-earth, known as the realm of Sauron and the home of Mount Doom.

places.name: Grey Ports
places.description: The Grey Havens, also known as the Ports of Grey, are a haven for the Elves in Middle-earth, serving as a departure point for those seeking passage to the Undying Lands.

places.name: Erebor
places.description: A dwarven kingdom reclaimed from a dragon, rich in gold and home to Thorin Oakenshield.

places.name: Lindon
places.description: A realm of Elves ruled by Gil-galad, located in the western part of Middle-earth.
